string-array.name: sentences
string-array.item: The other chair was a swivel chair as might be found in an average business office.
He put something on her head that made the chair look like an electric chair.
Which is good, of course, providing the flow doesn\'t become a flood, and the flood a mindless deluge.
It may be slower than a plane, bus or car, but for long-distance trips it has its good sides - a toilet, a dining car and a sleeping car.

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Is the author of the sentence in a business office?
Is the chair being discussed, an electric chair?
In the sentence, is it flooding?
Is the object being discussed, a plane?
